data.description: Perl extension for the Win32 API SearchPath
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
A direct call to the Win32 API SearchPath, hence its name. A
    simpler way to call the API than using Win32::API.

    It is meant as an add-on to Win32::CreateProcess, which requires
    the full path of the executable.
